input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCE SPECIALIST HOSPITAL. BLESSED FATHER JERZY POPIEŁUSKO IN WŁOCŁAWEK. Summary: Delivery of Two Ambulances with Equipment for the Emergency Medical Team in the Form of Leasing.. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery in the form of leasing of 2 ambulances with equipment for the Emergency Medical Team for the Provincial Specialist Hospital. Blessed priest Jerzy Popiełuszko in Włocławek.<br> 1.1. Detailed specification of the vehicle and equipment included in the leased subject is specified in Annex No. 2 to the SWZ, which the Contractor is obliged to complete and attach to the offer.<br> 1.2. Detailed technical specification and description of the subject of the order, required conditions for the base car, medical compartment and medical equipment ambulance is included in Annex No. 2a to the SWZ, which the Contractor is obliged to complete and attach to the offer.<br> 1.3. The offered ambulance must be manufactured in 2025, unused, non-demonstrative, not subject to exhibition, free from physical and legal defects, and in technical condition in accordance with the documentation, with an EC approval certificate for the base vehicle and the completed vehicle. (The Ordering Party reserves the right to verify the approval annexes before signing the contract in order to check their compliance with the offered parameters of the ambulance). For the purchased vehicle other required documents must also be attached (user and service manual, vehicle card, warranty card).<br> 1.4.The offered ambulance must meet the requirements specified in the regulations regarding the technical conditions of vehicles and the scope of their necessary equipment in the Regulation of the Minister .... Grace period for repayment of loan installments: until September 30, 2026, i.e. until the date of repayment of the first loan installment.<br> 5. The original of the above the letter will be sent to the Bank in parallel. Deadline collection of the loan by the Ordering Party expires on December 31, 2025.<br> 7. Loan security: The only form of loan security acceptable to the Ordering Party is a blank bill of exchange issued by the Pacyna Commune together with a bill of exchange declaration.<br> 8. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: NOWOGARD COMMUNE. Summary: Civil Liability Insurance, Property Insurance and Motor Insurance for Vehicles in the nowogard Commune. Provided that the last interest installment will be payable together with the capital installments until the date of repayment of the last loan installment.6) The cost of servicing the loan is: a) the loan interest rate, which consists of: base rate, variable interest rate calculated for each interest period based on the WIBOR 1M bank deposit interest rate, the contractor's margin was constant during the loan period (m), b) preparation fee for udz.... Published Date: 2025-11-04. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The loan interest rate will be determined annually according to a variable interest rate, based on the WIBOR 1M rate (as quoted on the interbank market) plus the Contractor's fixed margin. The loan will be made available through disposable loan disbursement or in tranches, depending on the Ordering Party's needs, without charging any fees.<br> 4. The condition for making the loan available to the Borrower is the establishment of legal security for the repayment of the loan in the form of a blank bill of exchange together with a bill of exchange declaration.<br> 5. The Ordering Party reserves the right to: the right to resign from taking out a loan without incurring additional costs in this respect.<br> 6. The Bank will open a credit account for the Borrower no later than on the day of concluding the agreement and will maintain it free of charge during the execution of the agreement.<br> 7.The required funds will be transferred to the basic account at the bank maintaining the District's current account.<br> 8. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STANISŁAWOW COMMUNE. Summary: Granting and Servicing a Long-Term Bank Loan to Repay Previously Incurred Credits and Loans. Description: The subject of the order are services consisting in granting and servicing a long-term loan in the amount of PLN 2,300,000 for the repayment of previously incurred credits and loans. Loan period: from the date of conclusion of the contract until August 31, 2035. Credit utilization date: from conclusion of the contract by December 31, 2025. Repayment of capital in the following installments and dates: a) 2026, 4 installments of PLN 15,000.00 per month, payable by the end of each month, b) years 2027-2034 - 8 years times 12 installments in each year of PLN 22,000.00 per month, payable by the end of each month, c) 2035 - 8 installments of PLN 16,000.00 each, payable by the end of each month. Monthly interest payment, on the last day of each month, based on a notification from the bank about the amount of accrued interest within 7 days before the payment date. The starting date for interest repayment is December 31, 2025. Interest will be calculated according to the WIBOR 1M rate determined as the rate on the last day of the month preceding the month for which interest is calculated and published by the Bank at the end of each period; the interest rate will change on a monthly basis in the event of a change in the rate. WIBOR 1 M increased by the bank's margin. The loan interest rate constitutes the loan servicing costs. The Ordering Party reserves the right to repay all or part of the loan early, without the bank collecting the remaining interest and additional fees and commissions related to the loan service. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ŁAZY COMMUNE. Summary: Granting a Long-Term Bank Loan in the Amount of Pln 4,500,000.00 to Finance the Planned Budget Deficit in 2025 and Repayment of Previously Incurred Liabilities of the Łazy Commune. Description: 1. The loan will be disbursed in 2025 in a maximum of 2 tranches, depending on the ordering party's current demand for loan funds.<br> 2. The deadline for using the loan is December 31, 2025.<br> 3. Loan period from the date of conclusion of the loan agreement until December 30, 2033.<br> 4. Contractor will open a credit account no later than on the day of concluding the credit agreement and will maintain it free of charge during its validity period.<br> 5. The contractor will make loan funds available to the ordering party on the day the contract is signed.<br> 6. The Contractor will release the loan funds in the amount and on the dates indicated by the ordering party in instructions submitted to the contractor, without submitting a separate credit application to be considered. The loan will be used until December 31, 2025 after a written instruction to disburse the loan to the Commune's account in a maximum of 2 tranches. Each tranche will be transferred to the ordering party within 2 business days of submitting a written instruction.<br> 7. The loan will be paid to the ordering party's account indicated in the instruction referred to in point 6.<br> 8. The Ordering Party has the right to use a loan in an amount lower than PLN 4,500,000.00 without incurring any additional costs (fees, commissions, etc.). Interest will not be charged on a loan granted but not yet disbursed. The minimum amount is PLN 3,000,000.00.<br> 9. The ordering party has the right to submit a written declaration of resignation from further use of the loan.<br> 10. Loan security .... Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-10-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The Contractor will provide the Ordering Party in 2025 loan in Polish currency in the amount of PLN 13,500,000.00 (in words: thirteen million five hundred thousand zlotys 00/100) on the terms specified in the agreement.<br> 2. The Ordering Party will use the funds from the loan to repay previously incurred liabilities under series A21 revenue bonds.<br> 3. Loan period: from the date of conclusion of the contract until December 31, 2040.<br> 4. The loan will be disbursed once until December 1, 2025 ("on request"), i.e. after the Ordering Party submits a written instruction to disburse the loan - the loan is available on the Ordering Party's account within a maximum of 2 business days from the date of submitting an instruction.<br> 5. The loan will be disbursed to the account indicated in the agreement.<br> 6. The grace period for repayment of the loan capital is valid until the day preceding the day of the first repayment of the capital installment.<br> 7. Repayment period of the loan capital - 15 years (from January 31, 2026 to December 31, 2040).<br> 8. The date of commencement of repayment of the principal installments of the loan (the first principal installment payment date is January 31, 2026. The subject of the order is the granting and servicing of a long-term bank loan in the total amount of PLN 10,000,000.00 (ten million zlotys) with a repayment date from June 30, 2033 to November 30, 2038 to finance the planned deficit in the amount of PLN 7,500,000 and repayment earlier liabilities incurred in 2025 in the amount of PLN 2,500,000.<br> 2. The loan will be granted and settled in Polish zlotys (PLN).<br> 3.The contractor will put up to loan at the Ordering Party's disposal on the day of signing the loan agreement. The loan will be disbursed once on the day the loan agreement is signed Bill Dębnica Kaszubska Commune, no later than on the next business day from the date of signing the contract.<br> 4. The Ordering Party reserves the right not to use the entire credit granted without incurring additional commissions and fees on this account.<br> 5. The loan will be repaid in 12 installments.<br> 6. In case the loan is repaid before the repayment date, interest will be calculated until the day before the loan repayment date, and not until the end of the contract period.<br> 7. Interest payable quarterly on the actual debt, in accordance with the schedule specified in the loan agreement.<br> 8.Interest cannot be capitalized.<br> 9.Contractor will not charge any fees and commissions related to granting, insuring and servicing the loan.<br> 10.The loan interest rate will be variable, equal to the sum of WIBOR 3M + m, where m is the bank's fixed margin that does not change during the term of the contract. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GOGOLIN COMMUNE. Summary: Granting a Long-Term Loan in the Amount of up to Pln 3,000,000. Description: The subject of the order is to grant a long-term loan up to PLN 3,000,000 to finance the planned municipal budget deficit for 2025. Quality requirements relating to all essential features of the subject of the order: 1. Provisions regarding making funds available Ordering Party. The Contractor makes funds available to the borrower in the period from the date of signing the contract (but not earlier than after the Ordering Party establishes legal security for the loan) until December 31, 2025.2. The loan will be made available to the Ordering Party in the form of a transfer of funds to the indicated bank account on the basis of written instruction.<br> The Ordering Party reserves the right not to use the loan in full, in which case the cost of the loan (margin, interest) will be calculated on the actual debt, and not on the requested maximum loan amount.<br> The loan will be secured by a blank promissory note issued by the Ordering Party with the countersignature of the Treasurer.<br> The Ordering Party reserves the right to early repayment of all or part of the loan.<br> In such a case, the loan repayment schedule will be changed in consultation with the bank.<br> Interest charged will be based on the actual debt, monthly, in the amount of currently applicable interest rates (Wibor 1M) and payable at the end of the calendar month (no later than on the last business day of a given month). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: STANISŁAWOW COMMUNE. Summary: Granting and Servicing a Long-Term Bank Loan to Repay Previously Incurred Credits and Loans. Description: The subject of the order are services consisting in granting and servicing a long-term loan in the amount of PLN 2,300,000.00 for the repayment of previously incurred credits and loans. Loan period: from the date of conclusion of the contract until August 31, 2035. Credit utilization date: from conclusion of the contract by December 31, 2025. Repayment of capital in the following installments and dates: a) 2026 - from September 2026, 4 installments of PLN 15,000.00 per month, payable by the end of each month, b) years 2027-2034 - 8 years times 12 installments in each year of PLN 22,000.00 per month, payable by the end of each month month, c) 2035 - 8 installments of PLN 16,000.00 each, payable by the end of each month. Monthly interest payment, on the last day of each month, based on a notification from the bank about the amount of accrued interest within 7 days before the payment date. The starting date for interest repayment is set at December 31, 2025. Interest will be calculated according to the WIBOR 1M rate determined as the rate on the last day of the month preceding the month for which interest is calculated and published by the Bank at the end of each period, the interest rate will change on a monthly basis in the case of changes in the WIBOR 1M rate increased by the bank's margin. The loan interest rate constitutes the loan servicing costs. The Ordering Party reserves the right to repay all or part of the loan early, without the bank collecting the remaining interest and additional fees and commissions. tie.... Published Date: 2025-10-23. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POLSKIE ELEKTROWNIE JĄDROWE SP. Z O.O.. Summary: Announcement Related to Request for Information (Rfi) - Lenders- Insurance Advisory Services. Description: The subject of the RFI is the provision of comprehensive Lenders- Insurance Advisory services. The overall role of the Lenders- Insurance Advisor is to confirm to the Lenders the adequacy of the insurance arrangements in relation to the Project. LIA will be required to provide an independent review, monitoring, advisory and reporting service for the benefit of the Lenders in the context of insurance to assist the structuring and arrangement of the financing for the Project. LIA will also confirm that the Lenders' security interest in the insurance is properly protected, recorded and documented. It is expected that LIA should liaise with other consultants as described below and may be required to attend meetings regarding the Project and its advisors and/or Lenders to review and discuss LIA-s findings. The announcement of the Request for Information, together with the attachments, including the Survey, is available at Procurement e-Platform at: https://pz.pej.pl/open-preview-auction.html/379561/lenders-insurance-advisory-services The deadline for submitting completed RFI form is October, 14th 2025, 15:00 CET <br> Doc Title: Announcement related to Request for Information (RFI) - Lenders- Insurance Advisory Services <br> Contract Type: services.
